languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, вокс-связь с капитаном "Бессердечного" установлена. По его словам, корабль и экипаж служат верой и правдой, защищая торговые суда династии".
"Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, вокс-связь с капитаном "Бессердечного" установлена. По его словам, корабль и экипаж служат верой и правдой, защищая торговые суда династии".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."
"Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."

"Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."
"Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ハートレスの船長とヴォクス通信が確立されました。彼によると、船とクルーは王朝の貿易船を護りながら、忠実にあなたに仕えているそうです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ハートレスの船長とヴォクス通信が確立されました。彼によると、船とクルーは王朝の貿易船を護りながら、忠実にあなたに仕えているそうです」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Taşkalp'in kaptanıyla voks bağlantısı kurduk. Geminin ve mürettebatın, hanedanlık ticaret gemilerini korurken size sadakatle hizmet ettiğini söylüyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, Taşkalp'in kaptanıyla voks bağlantısı kurduk. Geminin ve mürettebatın, hanedanlık ticaret gemilerini korurken size sadakatle hizmet ettiğini söylüyor."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos establecido contacto con el capitán de la Desalmada. Afirma que la nave y su tripulación le sirven fielmente, protegiendo las naves comerciales de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos establecido contacto con el capitán de la Desalmada. Afirma que la nave y su tripulación le sirven fielmente, protegiendo las naves comerciales de la dinastía».

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们已经与无心号的舰长建立了音阵连接。他报告说无心号全体船员都会忠实地为您服务，守护王朝的贸易舰船。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们已经与无心号的舰长建立了音阵连接。他报告说无心号全体船员都会忠实地为您服务，守护王朝的贸易舰船。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine Vox-Verbindung mit dem Captain der Heartless hergestellt. Er sagt, das Schiff und seine Crew wären Euch treu ergeben und schützen die Handelsschiffe der Dynastie."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine Vox-Verbindung mit dem Captain der Heartless hergestellt. Er sagt, das Schiff und seine Crew wären Euch treu ergeben und schützen die Handelsschiffe der Dynastie."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons établi une connexion vox avec le capitaine du Sans-Cœur. Il a indiqué que son vaisseau et tout son équipage vous serviront fidèlement tout en protégeant les vaisseaux de commerce de la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have established a vox-connection with the captain of the Heartless. He says the ship and her crew serve you faithfully while protecting the dynasty's trading vessels."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons établi une connexion vox avec le capitaine du Sans-Cœur. Il a indiqué que son vaisseau et tout son équipage vous serviront fidèlement tout en protégeant les vaisseaux de commerce de la dynastie. »
